# Pull Request Templates

Use `?template=filename` when opening a PR to pre-fill the body:

```
.../compare/main...your-branch?quick_pull=1&template=bug_fix.md
```

| Template | Use for |
|----------|---------|
| `pull_request_template.md` | Default (general PRs) |
| `bug_fix.md` | Bug fixes |
| `feature.md` | New features |
| `documentation.md` | Docs only |
| `mobile.md` | Android/iOS changes |
| `api.md` | IoT API changes |
